Name: Health
Description: 解锁：初始血量{InitialValue}点 | 升级：每次+{ModuleUpgrade}点

Name: Shield
Description: 解锁：初始抵挡{InitialValue}次伤害 | 升级：抵挡次数+{ModuleUpgrade}

Name: Shooter
Description: 解锁：初始射速{InitialValue} | 升级：炮口+1级+射速+{ModuleUpgrade}%

Name: Dash
Description: 解锁：初始冷却{InitialValue}秒 | 升级：冷却-{ModuleUpgrade}秒

Name: Movement
Description: 解锁：初始移速{InitialValue} | 升级：每次+{ModuleUpgrade}%
